deposit(address,uint32,address,uint256).details: Transfers the token amount to the DaoDepositManager and                          stores the parameters in a Deposit structure

params._dealId: The dealId to which this deposit is part of
params._module: The address of the module for which is being deposited
params._token: The address of the token that is deposited

params._dao: The DAO address to which this contract belongs

setDealManagerImplementation(address).details: Sets a new address for the DealManager implementation

params._newDaoDepositManager: The address of the new DealManager
